text: Yā pana bhikkhunī cīvarasaṅkamanīyaṃ dhāreyya pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī cīvarasaṅkamanīyaṃ dhāreyya pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 25. Should any bhikkhunī wear a robe that should be given back (one that she has borrowed from another bhikkhunī without asking her permission), it is to be confessed.
